Probability:

<!-- \input{Physics_incisions_content/Physics_Wavefunction.tex} -->

$$\begin{split} &
P = 
\frac{\mathscr{I}}{N \cdot h\nu} dA dt = 
\left| \Psi \right|^2 = 
\Psi^*\Psi 
\stackrel{interference, pathindependent}{=} 
\left| \sum\Psi_i \right|^2 =
\stackrel{no interference, pathdependent}{=} 
\sum \left| \Psi_i \right|^2 
\end{split}$${#eq-probability-1}

where:
$\mathscr{I} \equiv$ Intensitiy
$N \equiv$ particles
$A \equiv$ area of incidence orthogonal to movement



Absorbtion Probability:

$$\begin{split} &
\frac{P}{t} :=
W_{mn} = 
B_{mn} \cdot \frac{N(\nu)}{V} \cdot h\nu = 
B_{mn} \cdot w_\nu(\nu) = 
B_{mn} \cdot \frac{d}{d\nu} w_{EM} 
\end{split}$${#eq-probability-2}


Stimulated Emission Probability:

$$\begin{split} &
\frac{P}{t} =:
W_{nm} = 
B_{nm} \cdot \frac{N(\nu)}{V} \cdot h\nu = 
B_{nm} \cdot w_\nu(\nu) = 
B_{nm} \cdot \frac{d}{d\nu} w_{EM} 
\end{split}$${#eq-probability-3}


Spontaneous Emission Probability:

$$\begin{split} &
\frac{P}{t} =:
W_{nm} = 
A_{nm} = 
\frac{1}{\bar{\tau}}
\end{split}$${#eq-probability-4}

where:
$n \equiv$ exited state
$m \equiv$ ground state
$N \equiv$ particles amount
$V \equiv$ Volume
$\bar{\tau} \equiv$ mean livetime of state for spontaneous emission
$B, A \equiv$ Einsteincoefficients
